title: $:/plugins/can/omni
author: Chris Nicoll

<$draggable filter="[] [list[]]"> <$view field="title"/>   <$macrocall $name="exportButton" exportFilter="[] [list[]]" lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddlers/"/>
" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/ui/ViewTemplate/makeomnibus": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/ui/ViewTemplate/makeomnibus", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body", "text": "<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes"> <$list filter="[all[current]tag[omnibus]]" variable="null"><> " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/action-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/action-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define omni-toggle-edit() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> editstate="edit"/> \define omni-toggle-view() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> editstate="view"/> \define omni-startedit-actions() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value="show"/><><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{!!text}}/> \define omni-submitedit-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/> \define omni-canceledit-actions() <$action-setfield text={{$(editstatetid)$}} $timestamp='no'/><> \define omni-toggle-title-edit() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> editstate="edit"/> \define omni-toggle-title-view() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> editstate="view"/> \define omni-starttitleedit-actions() <><$action-setfield newtitle={{!!title}} $timestamp='no'/><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> oldtitle={{!!title}}/> \define omni-submittitleedit-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-rename-tiddler" from=<> to={{!!newtitle}} /><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/> \define omni-canceltitleedit-actions() <$action-setfield newtitle={{$(edittitlestatetid)$!!oldtitle}} $timestamp='no'/><> \define omni-start-tiddler-drag() "<$action-listops $field=dragstarttiddler $filter=<> />" \define can-omni-shift-drop() <$list filter="[match[shift]]" variable="null"> <$set name=dragstarttitle filter="[get[dragstarttiddler]]" select="0"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter='-[]'/><$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='omniparent' $subfilter='-[]'/> \end \define readlevel() [{$(datatiddler)$##$(currentTiddler)$}] \define omni-leveldn-actions() "<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $index=<> $filter='=$(readlevel)$ +[subtract[1]] +[max[0]]'/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>" \define omni-levelup-actions() "<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $index=<> $filter='=$(readlevel)$ +[add[1]] +[min[6]]'/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>" " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/button-macros.tid": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/button-macros.tid", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "text": " \define can-omni-levelctl()
<$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" aria-label="Unindent" tooltip="Unindent" actions="<>">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/unindent.svg}} <$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" aria-label="Indent" tooltip="Indent" actions="<>">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/indent.svg}}
\end \define can-omni-delete() <$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" aria-label="Delete tiddler" tooltip="Delete tiddler"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-delete-tiddler"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $filter='[listis[tiddler]]'/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end \define can-omni-delist() <$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" aria-label="Remove from list" tooltip="Remove from list" actions="<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter='-[]'/><$action-listops $field='omniparent' $subfilter='-[]' /><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/delist.svg}} \end \define can-omni-toggleadd() <$reveal type=nomatch state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-toggleadd"> <$button tag="div" class="can-omni-button can-rightedge tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Add tiddler here" aria-label="Add tiddler here" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text='open'/>" >{{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$reveal type=match state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-toggleadd" > <$button tag="div" class="can-omni-button can-rightedge tc-btn-invisible" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text='closed'/>">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} \end \define can-omni-link() <$draggable tiddler=<> startactions=<> > <$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="Open tiddler in story" aria-label="Open tiddler in story">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/fish-water.svg}} \end \define can-omni-title() <$draggable tiddler=<> startactions=<> > <$button class="can-omni-button can-omni-title tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="Tiddler link" aria-label="Tiddler link">
<$text text=<>/>
\end \define can-omni-title-link() <$draggable tiddler=<> startactions=<> > <$button tag="div" class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="Tiddler link" aria-label="Tiddler link">
{{$:/plugins/can/omni/fish-water.svg}}
<$text text=<>/>
\end \define can-omni-mark-done() <$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" aria-label="Tag item as done" tooltip="Tag item as done" actions="<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter='-[]'/><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /><$action-listops $tags='done'/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/checkmark.svg}} \end \define can-omni-make-omnibus() <$button class="can-omni-button tc-btn-invisible" aria-label="Tag item as omnibus" tooltip="Tag item as omnibus" actions="<$action-listops $tags='omnibus'/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/make-omni.svg}} \end" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/component-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/component-macros", "created": "20200618174950677", "creator": "chris", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\whitespace trim \define can-omni-folder() <$button class="can-omni-foldbutton tc-btn-invisible can-small-text-button"> <$reveal type="match" tag="div" state=<> text="hide" > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value="show"/> {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" > <><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value="hide"/> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} \end \define can-omni-itemhandle() <$button tag="div" class="can-omni-itemhandle tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Click to toggle text edit. Drag to move list entry." aria-label="Click to toggle text edit. Drag to move list entry."> <$draggable tiddler=<> startactions=<> >
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> \end \define can-omni-text() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div>
<$omnidblclick actions="<>"/> <$transclude $tiddler="<>" mode="block"/>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div> <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="cmd-enter" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="ctrl-enter" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="escape" actions="<>"> <$edit-text class="can-quickadd-textarea tc-tiddler-body" field='text' placeholder='New tiddler text' rows="1" minHeight="0" focus=true/> \end \define can-omni-titleheading() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag="div" class="omni-title-heading view" title="Double-click to edit title." aria-label="Double-click to edit title."> <$omnidblclick actions="<>"/> {{!!title}} <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div class="omni-title-heading"> <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="cmd-enter" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="ctrl-enter" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="escape" actions="<>"> <$edit-text class="can-quickadd-textarea" field='newtitle' rows="1" minHeight="0" focus=true/> \end \define classfilt() can-outline-item [[$(datatiddler)$]has:index[$(currentTiddler)$]then{$(datatiddler)$##$(currentTiddler)$}else[0]] +[join[-]] can-omni-text \define can-omni-text-region() <$set name=levelcls filter=<>> <$reveal tag="div" class=<> type="match" state=<> text="hide" > <> <$reveal tag="div" class=<> type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" > <> \end \define can-omni-text-ro() <$set name=levelcls filter=<>> <$reveal tag="div" class=<> type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" >
<$transclude $tiddler="<>" mode="block"/>
\end \define set-toc-view-tiddler() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> toc-view-tiddler=<> /> \define omni-toc-heading-class-filter() omni-toc-heading [get[toc-view-tiddler]matchthen[selected]] \define can-omni-toc-item() <$set name=levelcls filter=<>><$set name=omni-toc-heading-class filter=<> > <$button tag="div" class=<> actions=<>>{{!!title}} <$reveal tag="div" class="can-omni-toc-sub can-omni-text" type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" > <> \end \define can-omni-singleview()
<$tiddler tiddler={{!!toc-view-tiddler}} > <> <$transclude mode=block/>
\end \define can-omni-todo-region() <$set name=levelcls filter=<>>
>>
<>
\end \define can-omni-bullet()
\end \define can-omni-outline-region() <$set name=levelcls filter=<>>
>><>
\end \define omni-showomni() <$reveal tag="div" class="omni-showomni" type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" > <$list filter="[tag[omnibus]]"><$macrocall $name="compose-omni" mode=<>/> \end \define omni-showomni-subtoc() <$reveal tag="div" class="omni-showomni-subtoc" type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" > <$list filter="[tag[omnibus]]"><> \end " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/component-state-defs": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/component-state-defs", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\define editstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/editstate/$(createdid)$ \define edittitlestatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/edittitlestate/$(createdid)$ \define foldstatetiddler() $:/keepstate/can/omni/fold/$(createdid)$ \define top-quick-openstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/top-openstate/$(omniqual)$ \define top-quickstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/top-quickstate/$(omniqual)$ \define peri-quick-openstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/peri-openstate/$(createdid)$ \define peri-quickstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/peri-quickstate/$(createdid)$ \define append-quick-openstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/append-openstate/$(omniqual)$ \define append-quickstatetid() $:/keepstate/can/omni/append-quickstate/$(omniqual)$ " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/documentation": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/documentation", "caption": "documentation", "text": "See the demo ~TiddlyWiki at https://clutterstack.github.io/TW5-omni ''Omni'' (short for "omnibus") is a plugin that I am writing to make it easier to add and to organize content within my ~TiddlyWiki, particularly grouped content, like notes on a subject (or notes from a single source), or lists of things to do. ''Omni'' has much in common with plugins such as [[Streams|https://saqimtiaz.github.io/sq-tw/streams.html]] by [[Saq Imtiaz|https://github.com/saqimtiaz]] and [[NotoWritey|https://marxsal.github.io/various/notowritey.html]] by Mark S. ([[Marxsal|https://github.com/Marxsal]]). !!Basic capabilities * Quickly add tiddlers within a collection, without needing to think of a title right away (or ever) (using the ''Quick'' plugin) * Edit tiddler text in-place * Rearrange tiddlers within and between omnibuses by drag and drop * Drag and drop to add tiddlers to the omnibus * Add (existing) tags to tiddlers by drag and drop * Set indentation levels or styles for tiddlers within the omnibus * "Fold" and "unfold" tiddler transclusions !!Dependencies The ''Omni'' plugin requires the companion ''Quick'' plugin (https://github.com/clutterstack/TW5-quick) for entering new tiddlers within omnibuses. Cameron Fischer's Relink plugin (https://github.com/flibbles/tw5-relink) is not strictly necessary but is very handy for any ~TiddlyWiki, and it can be configured to watch the omniparent field generated by ''Omni''. However, the `omniparent` field is redundant for the moment and may be removed from the ''Omni'' plugin. ''Omni'' currently uses multiline text in a custom field. This creates problems with saving tiddlers on node.js. [[Saq Imtiaz's patch|https://groups.google.com/g/tiddlywiki/c/H1CAnuKWgng/m/Gf3mZaaZCQAJ]] fixed it for me. ''Omnibuses:'' <<< Are tiddlers that transclude a set of other tiddlers (determined by their presence in the omnibus tiddler's `list` field). Offer display and limited editing options for listed tiddlers. <<< Another way to look at an omnibus is as something kind of like a tiddler with a ''list-links-draggable'' macro in it, with a complicated ''itemTemplate''. A tiddler can be made into an "omnibus" by tagging it <>. It can also have other tags, other fields, and text, like any tiddler. !! Motivations * to present multiple related tiddlers at once with the ability to reorganize, edit, and tag them from a "bird's eye" view; * to reduce mental overhead during note capture while adding some inherent organization; * to provide a scaffolding to create a structured document out of tiddlers. * to free up tags for general relationships rather than specific tiddler grouping; " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/fleet-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/fleet-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "text": "\whitespace trim \define fleet() <$set name=parentval value=<> >
<$list filter="[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]"> <>
<>
\end" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnitab": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnitab", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "caption": "Omni", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open", "text": "<> <>" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnimode-listwithtags.svg": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnimode-listwithtags.svg", "text": " " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnimode-simple.svg": { "title": "modified": "20200623134632387", "modifier": "chris", "text": " " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/license": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/license", "caption": "license", "text": "BSD 3-Clause License THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS "AS IS" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE." }, "$:/can/macros/omnifleettoc": { "title": "$:/can/macros/omnifleettoc", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "text": "\whitespace trim \define omnitoclabel(chars:100) <$wikify name="can-long-label" text={{{ [{!!title}!match{!!created}] ~[get[text]!is[blank]] ~[get[title]]}}}> <$text text={{{ [split[]first[$chars$]join[]] }}}/> \end \define omni-link-caption(class) <$draggable tag="span" tiddler=<> startactions=<> > <$button class="can-omni-dragdrop tc-btn-invisible $class$" to={{!!title}} tooltip="Tiddler link" aria-label="Tiddler link"><> \end \define omni-dragdrop-caption(class) <$droppable actions="<><$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='omniparent' $subfilter='[]'/><$action-listops $subfilter='[]'/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>" > <> \end \define fleettoc-level-component() <$list filter="[all[current]tag[fleet]]" emptyMessage="<>" ><> \end \define check-if-omni-for-caption() <$list filter="[all[current]tag[omnibus]]" emptyMessage="<>" > <> \end \define fleettoc-linked-body(root,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$qualify name="toc-state" title={{{ [[$:/state/toc]addsuffix<__path__>addsuffix[-]addsuffix] }}}> <$vars parentval=<<__root__>> > <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item" >
  • >> <$list filter="[all[current]list[]$sort$limit[1]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}}"> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo="open" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-popup-keep"> {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo="close" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-popup-keep"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$macrocall $name="fleettoc-list" root=<> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> path=<<__path__>>/>
    • \end \define fleettoc-unlinked-body(root,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$qualify name="toc-state" title={{{ [[$:/state/toc]addsuffix<__path__>addsuffix[-]addsuffix] }}}> <$vars parentval=<<__root__>> > <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item">
  • >> <$list filter="[all[current]list[]$sort$limit[1]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="<$button class='tc-btn-invisible'>{{$:/core/images/blank}} <$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/>"> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo="open" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-popup-keep"> {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo="close" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-popup-keep"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$macrocall $name="fleettoc-list" root=<> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> exclude=<<__exclude__>> path=<<__path__>>/>
    • \end \define fleettoc-empty-message() <$macrocall $name="fleettoc-linked-body" root=<> sort=<> itemClassFilter=<> exclude=<> path=<>/> \end \define fleettoc-list(root,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$vars root=<<__root__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> path={{{ [<__path__>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<__root__>] }}}> <$set name="excluded" filter="""[enlist<__exclude__>] [<__root__>]""">
      <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]list<__root__>!has[draft.of]$sort$] -[<__root__>] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"""> <$list filter="[all[current]toc-link[no]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage=<> > <$macrocall $name="fleettoc-unlinked-body" root=<<__root__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> exclude=<> path=<>/>
    \end \define fleettoc()
    Omnibus Fleets
      <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[fleet]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$macrocall $name="fleettoc-linked-body" root=<> />
    <>
    \end \define omnis-filter() [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[omnibus]!tag[fleet]!has[draft.of]sort[]] \define fleetless-omnis()
    <>
      <$list filter=<>> <$list filter="[all[current]listed[]tag[fleet]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage="<$macrocall $name='fleettoc-linked-body' root=<> />">
    \end \define delist-from-omni(class caption) <$droppable actions="<><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>" > $caption$ :
    \end " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnibus-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/omnibus-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "text": "\whitespace trim \define omni-datastate() <> \define omni-mode-from-parent-or-self() {{$(parentval)$!!omnibus-mode}} \define omni-mode-from-self() {{!!omnibus-mode}} \define can-omni-teaser()
    <$macrocall $name=teaser title=<> chars=300 maxelements=1 />
    \define omni-mode-call-macro() <$macrocall $name=every$(mode)$ /> \define omni-stream-class() can-omni-stream $(mode)$ \define compose-omni(mode:{{!!omnibus-mode}}) <$vars datatiddler=$(omni-datastate)$ parentval=<> > <$set name=mode value=$mode$ emptyValue=read > <$qualify name=omniqual title={{!!created}}> <>
    > > <$list filter="[match[read]then[]] [match[toc]then[]] [match[namedro]then[]] [match[list]then[]]" variable="null" emptyMessage=<>/> <$list filter="[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]"> <$qualify name=createdid title={{!!created}} > <> <$list filter="[match[read]then[]] [match[toc]then[]] [match[namedro]then[]] [match[list]then[]]" variable="null" emptyMessage=<>/>
    <$list filter="[!match[toc]then[]]" variable="null" emptyMessage=<>/>
    \end \define compose-omni-subtoc() <$vars datatiddler=$(omni-datastate)$> <$qualify name=omniqual title={{!!created}}>
    <$list filter="[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]"> <$qualify name=createdid title={{!!created}} > <>
    \end" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/buttons/omnimodebar": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/buttons/omnimodebar", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/can/omni/omni-modebar-hide.svg}}{{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-hide/Caption}}", "created": "20201104222546779", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-hide/Hint}}", "modified": "20201105015227943", "showModeState": "show", "showmodestate": "show", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\whitespace trim <$reveal type="nomatch" state=!!showModeState text="hide" default="show"> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-hide/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-hide/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> showModeState=hide/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]" variable="listItem"> {{$:/plugins/can/omni/omni-modebar-hide.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=" "/> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-hide/Caption}}/> <$reveal type="match" state=!!showModeState text="hide" default="show"> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-show/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-show/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> showModeState=show/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]" variable="listItem"> {{$:/plugins/can/omni/omni-modebar-show.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=" "/> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/omnimodebar-show/Caption}}/> " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/omni2clicklistener.js": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/omni2clicklistener.js", "text": "/*\ title: $:/plugins/can/omni/omni2clicklistener.js type: application/javascript module-type: widget Mashup between the core keyboard widget and https://danielorodriguez.com/TW5-2click2edit/: Allows an event to trigger actions or messages, like the keyboard widget, but for the dblclick event only, and like 2click2edit it doesn't enclose child content in yet another element but instead adds a listener to its parent element. In fact, don't enclose anything in it; it won't get rendered. Just close it: e.g. <$omnidblclick actions="<>"/> I haven't actually tested messages, so it's possible I haven't got that working properly. \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; var Widget = require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js").widget; var ClickListener = function(parseTreeNode,options) { this.initialise(parseTreeNode,options); }; /* Inherit from the base widget class */ ClickListener.prototype = new Widget(); /* Render this widget into the DOM */ ClickListener.prototype.render = function(parent,nextSibling) { this.parentDomNode = parent; this.computeAttributes(); this.execute(); var self = this; /*Danielo says: Since the event listener have been added to the parent, the "this" property is pointing to the wrong object, we should call our edit function with our widget object set as the this property.*/ parent.addEventListener("dblclick",function(event){ var handled = self.invokeActions(self,event); if(self.actions) { self.invokeActionString(self.actions,self,event); } self.dispatchMessage(event); if(handled || self.actions || self.message) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } return true; }); }; ClickListener.prototype.dispatchMessage = function(event) { this.dispatchEvent({type: this.message, param: this.param, tiddlerTitle: this.getVariable("currentTiddler")}); }; /* Compute the internal state of the widget */ ClickListener.prototype.execute = function() { var self = this; // Get attributes this.actions = this.getAttribute("actions",""); this.message = this.getAttribute("message",""); this.param = this.getAttribute("param",""); }; /* Selectively refreshes the widget if needed. Returns true if the widget or any of its children needed re-rendering */ ClickListener.prototype.refresh = function(changedTiddlers) { return false; }; exports.omnidblclick = ClickListener; })();", "type": "application/javascript", "module-type": "widget" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/ui/tagaddtemplate": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/ui/tagaddtemplate", "created": "20200630202624857", "creator": "chris", "modified": "20200705021705324", "modifier": "chris", "omni-tagaddtoggle": "show", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "THis tiddler isn't used yet. It's for adding tags through the TW widget, but that's too ugly still. \define can-omni-tagaddbutton() <$set name="newTagNameTiddler" value=<>> <$set name="tag" value={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$button set="$:/temp/NewTagName" setTo="" class="can-omnibus-meta-controls tc-btn-invisible"> <$macrocall $name="add-tag-actions" actions=<<__actions__>>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> {{$:/plugins/can/omni/new-tag.svg}} \end \define can-omni-tagadd() <$importvariables filter="[[$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags]]"> <$fieldmangler>
    <$set name="tabIndex" value={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}}> <$reveal type="match" state="!!omni-tagaddtoggle" text="show" tag=div class="can-omni-button-container"> <$button class="can-omnibus-meta-controls tc-btn-invisible" actions="<$action-setfield omni-tagaddtoggle='hide'/>">{{$:/core/images/cancel-button}} <$reveal type="match" state="!!omni-tagaddtoggle" text="show" tag=div> <$macrocall $name="tag-picker"/> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!omni-tagaddtoggle" text="show" tag=div class="can-omni-button-container"> <$button class="can-omnibus-meta-controls tc-btn-invisible" actions="<$action-setfield omni-tagaddtoggle='show'/>">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/new-tag.svg}} <$reveal type="match" state="!!omni-tagaddtoggle" text="show" tag=div class="can-omni-button-container"> <>
    \end <>" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/overhead-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/overhead-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\whitespace trim \define can-omni-toptools()
    <$list filter="[match[todo]then[]] [match[list]then[]]" emptyMessage=<> variable="null"/> <$list filter="[{!!showModeState}match[hide]then[]]" emptyMessage=<> variable="null"/>
    \end \define omni-viewswitcher()
    <$button set="!!omnibus-mode" setTo="edit" class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" selectedClass="can-omni-button-selected" tooltip="Deluxe editing" aria-label="Deluxe editing">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/omnimode-edit.svg}} <$button set="!!omnibus-mode" setTo="todo" class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" selectedClass="can-omni-button-selected" tooltip="Todo list" aria-label="Todo list"><>{{$:/plugins/can/omni/omnimode-simple.svg}} <$button set="!!omnibus-mode" setTo="read" class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" selectedClass="can-omni-button-selected" tooltip="Reading mode" aria-label="Reading mode">{{$:/plugins/can/omni/omnimode-view.svg}} <$button set="!!omnibus-mode" setTo="named" class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" selectedClass="can-omni-button-selected" tooltip="Edit mode with title" aria-label="Edit mode with title">named <$button set="!!omnibus-mode" setTo="namedro" class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" selectedClass="can-omni-button-selected" tooltip="Read-only mode with title" aria-label="Read-only mode with title">namedro <$button set="!!omnibus-mode" setTo="toc" class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" selectedClass="can-omni-button-selected" tooltip="TOC mode" aria-label="TOC mode">toc
    \end \define unfoldallactions() <$list filter='[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]'> <$qualify name=createdid title={{!!created}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value='show'/> \end \define foldallactions() <$list filter='[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]'> <$qualify name=createdid title={{!!created}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value='hide'/> \end \define can-omni-foldall()
    <$button class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" tooltip="Unfold all items" aria-label="Unfold all items"> {{$:/core/images/unfold-all-button}} <$list filter='[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]'> <$qualify name=createdid title={{!!created}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value='show'/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible can-omni-button" tooltip="Fold all items" aria-label="Fold all items"> {{$:/core/images/fold-all-button}} <$list filter='[all[current]list[]is[tiddler]]'> <$qualify name=createdid title={{!!created}} > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value='hide'/>
    \end \define classfilt() can-outline-item [[$(datatiddler)$]has:index[$(currentTiddler)$]then{$(datatiddler)$##$(currentTiddler)$}else[0]] +[join[-]] can-omni-text \define can-omni-topadd() <$vars openstatetid=<> quickstatetid=<>>
    <$droppable tag="div" actions="<><$action-listops $subfilter='[] +[putfirst[]]'/><$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='omniparent' $subfilter='[]' /><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>"> <>
    <$reveal type=match state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-bottom"> <$macrocall $name="quickadd" layout="subui" quickstatetid=<> omniparent=<> position="omni-listtop" openstatetid=<> endstate="closed" /> \end \define can-omni-peripheral() <$vars openstatetid=<> quickstatetid=<>>
    <$droppable tag="div" actions="<><$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler] +[move]'/><$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field='omniparent' $subfilter='[]' /><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>"> <$macrocall $name="can-omni-toggleadd"/>
    <$reveal type=match state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-bottom"> <$macrocall $name="quickadd" layout="subui" quickstatetid=<> omniparent=<> openstatetid=<> endstate="closed" /> \end \define can-omni-quickappend() <$vars openstatetid=<> quickstatetid=<>>
    <$reveal type=nomatch state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-quickappend"> <$button tag="div" class="can-omni-button big tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Open quickadd interface" aria-label="Open quickadd interface" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text='open'/>" >{{$:/plugins/can/quick/quickadd-toolbar-btn-dark.svg}} <$reveal type=match state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-quickappend" > <$button tag="div" class="can-omni-button tiny tc-btn-invisible" actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text='closed'/>">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal type=match state=<> text="open" tag=div class="can-omni-bottom"> <$macrocall $name="quickadd" layout="subui" omniparent=<> quickstatetid=<> openstatetid=<> endstate="open" />
    \end " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/readme", "caption": "readme", "text": "

    ''Warning:''This plugin does all sorts of things, including altering and deleting tiddlers. It may do something unexpected to your tiddlers! Use at your own risk, with your data backed up.

    Not only that, but I may introduce breaking changes.

    The Omni (short for omnibus) plugin is meant to make it easier to collect and organise related bits of information or writing. Demo: https://clutterstack.github.io/TW5-omni/ It depends on my Quick plugin (https://github.com/clutterstack/TW5-quick) for adding tiddlers in-line. The Relink plugin (https://github.com/flibbles/tw5-relink) by Cameron Fischer is highly recommended at this time. " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-btns-ctls.tid": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-btns-ctls.tid", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "text": ".can-omni-ctlrow { grid-column: 3/5; display: flex; flex-direction:row; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: space-between; padding-top: 0.4em; margin-right: 2em;} .can-omni-ctl { grid-column: 4/5; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-end; align-content: flex-start; padding-top: 0.4em; padding-left: 0.4em; } .can-omni-subctl { display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; align-content: flex-start; } .can-omni-foldbutton { grid-column: 1/2; align-self: start; height: 1.5em; z-index: 9999; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: flex-start; margin-top: 0.4em; margin-right: 0.2em; } .can-omni-foldbutton:hover svg {fill: #666666;} .namedro .can-omni-ctlrow { font-size: 1.4em; font-weight: 500; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; } /*.namedro .can-omni-foldbutton {margin-top: 1.2rem;}*/ .can-omni-title { font-size: 0.8em;} span.can-omni-title {vertical-align: bottom;} div.can-omni-title {margin-left: 0.4em; align-self: flex-end;} a:hover.can-omni-title { color: inherit; text-decoration: none; } a.can-omni-title { color: #cccccc; align-self: flex-end;} .can-omni-levelctl { display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex: 0 0 auto; } .can-small-text-button {font-size: 0.8rem;} .can-small-text-button .tc-menubar-dropdown-arrow {padding-left: 0.4em;} .can-omni-button svg, .can-omni-foldbutton svg {flex: 0 0 auto; fill: #cccccc;} .can-omni-button.can-omni-button-selected {color: #66c;} .can-omni-button.can-omni-button-selected svg { fill: #66c; } .can-omni-button:hover, .can-omni-button:hover svg {fill: #999999;} .can-omni-button {color: #cccccc;} div.can-omni-button, .todo button.can-omni-button { display: flex; flex-direction: row; align-self: flex-start; } .can-omni-ctlrow .tc-draggable { display: flex; flex-direction:row; } /* .omni-toc-view.can-omni-button { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } */ /*.can-omni-ctl .tc-draggable svg, .can-omni-ctlrow .tc-draggable svg { align-self: flex-end; }*/ .can-omni-foldall, .can-omni-viewswitcher {display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-end;} .can-omni-viewswitcher .can-omni-button svg { width: 20pt; height: 20pt; } .can-omni-foldall .can-omni-button svg { width: 14pt; height: 14pt; } /* Shrink the control icons in sub-omnis */ .can-omni-stream .can-omni-stream .can-omni-button svg, .can-omni-stream .can-omni-foldall .can-omni-button svg { width: 10pt; height: 10pt; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-stream .can-omni-button.big svg { width: 14pt; height: 14pt; } /* don't show the view switcher in a sub-omni */ .can-omni-stream .can-omni-toptools .can-omni-viewswitcher { display: none; } /*.can-omni-stream .can-omni-toptools { margin: 0.6em 0 0 0; }*/ " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-components": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-components", "created": "20200507184921957", "creator": "chris", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "text": " .can-omni-toptools { margin: 0 0 0.4em 0; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-between; } .omni-stream-container { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; } .can-omni-stream { display: grid; grid-template-columns: auto auto 7fr max-content; /* 1em auto 7fr auto; */ grid-template-rows: auto; margin-left: -0.6em; width: 100%; } .can-omni-stream pre { /* max-width: calc({{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storywidth}} - 25%); */ overflow: auto; } .can-omni-stream ul { margin: 0; padding-left: 1em; } /* Style the quickadd for in an omnibus */ .can-quickadd.sub {margin-top: 0;} .can-omni-itemhandle {width: 1.6em; grid-column: 2/3; grid-row: span 2; margin-left: -0.8em;} .can-omni-itemhandle .tc-draggable { height: 100%;} .can-omni-itemhandle-inner { box-sizing: content-box; border-radius: 2px; height: 100%; width: 2px; background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 0.8em; } .can-omni-itemhandle:hover .can-omni-itemhandle-inner { background-color: #999999; } .can-omni-stream > div.tc-draggable { cursor: pointer; } .can-omni-stream .omni-title-heading { grid-column:3/5; flex: 1; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 400; margin-right: 0.4em; } .can-omni-stream .omni-title-heading.view { margin: 0.2em 0.4em 0.4em 0; } .can-omni-stream .omni-title-heading .can-quickadd-textarea { margin: 0 0.4em 0 0; border: 1px solid #ccc; } .omni-text-as-button {height: 100%;} .todo > .can-omni-text {display: flex; flex-direction: row;} .can-omni-text { grid-column: 3/4; display: flex; flex-direction: row; z-index: 10;} .can-omni-text[hidden] {display: none;} .can-omni-text .tc-reveal, .can-omni-todo-text {width: 100%; } .can-omni-text p, .can-omni-text li { margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0.5em; max-width: 40em; } p > svg, ol >li > svg, ul > li > svg {width: 1.2em; height: 1.2em;} .can-omni-text p:nth-child(1) { margin-top: 0; } /* .can-omni-text p:last-child { margin-bottom: 0.6em; }*/ .can-omni-meta { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } .omni-showomni {grid-column:3/5; } /* Space to the left of subomnis */ .can-omni-stream .can-omni-stream.todo, .can-omni-stream .can-omni-stream.read, .can-omni-stream .can-omni-stream.namedro { margin-left: 1em; } /* Above and below item droppable zones */ .can-omni-peripheral, .can-omni-topadd { grid-column: 1/5; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-between; line-height: 16pt; background-color: #ffffff;} .can-omni-peripheral .tc-droppable, .can-omni-topadd .tc-droppable { width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-end; } .can-omni-peripheral .tc-dragover, .can-omni-topadd .tc-dragover, .tc-dragover .can-omnibus-droppable { border-radius: 5px;background-color: #0ff; } .can-omni-toggleadd .can-omni-button {justify-content: flex-end;} .can-omni-toggleadd .can-omni-button svg {height: 10pt; width: 10pt;} .can-omni-toggleadd, .can-omni-toggleadd .can-omni-button {padding: 1px; border-radius: 4px; width: 100%;} .can-omni-toggleadd:hover {background-color: #efefef;} .can-omni-bottom { grid-column: 2/5; margin-bottom: 0.8em; } /* Depending on view mode */ .todo > .can-omni-foldbutton {display: none;} /*.read > .can-omni-text {margin-left: 0.3em; margin-bottom: 0.5em;}*/ .zone .can-omni-itemhandle, .zone .can-omni-text {margin-bottom: 0.8em;} .can-omni-stream.todo {grid-template-columns: auto auto 7fr auto; } /* Styling according to level in data tiddler (could do by layout mode too) */ /* .can-outline-item-0.can-omni-text { } */ .can-outline-item-1.can-omni-text { padding-left: 2em; } .can-outline-item-2.can-omni-text { padding-left: 4em; } .can-outline-item-3.can-omni-text { padding-left: 6em; } .can-outline-item-4.can-omni-text { padding-left: 8em; } .can-outline-item-5.can-omni-text { padding-left: 10em;} .can-outline-item-6.can-omni-text { background-color: #9fd; } .can-outline-item-7.can-omni-text {} .can-outline-item-8.can-omni-text {} /* ----------------------------------------- */ /* omni-bullet */ /* ----------------------------------------- */ .can-omni-bullet { flex: 0 0 auto; box-sizing: content-box; border-radius: 50%; width: 6px; height: 6px; background-color: #333333; align-self: flex-start; margin-top: 0.5em;margin-right: 0.5em;} /* --------------- */ /* media-dependent */ /* --------------- */ @media (max-width: 620px) { .can-omni-stream { grid-template-columns: auto auto 5fr auto; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-text { grid-column: 3/4; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-ctl { grid-column: 3/4; margin: 0.4em 1em 0 0; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area { grid-column: 4/5; } } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tags.tc-edit-tags { margin-bottom: -12pt; } /* more */ .omni-bundle { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } /* headings */ .can-omni-stream h1, .can-omni-stream h2, .can-omni-stream h3 { margin-top: 0; }" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-sidebar-fleets.tid": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-sidebar-fleets.tid", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "text": "/* Fleet outliner styles */ ol.omni-toc { list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; } .omni-sidebar-toc h1 { margin: 0.4em 0 0 0; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: 500; } .omni-toc > li.toc-item li.toc-item {padding-left: 0.2em;} .fleet-label, .omnibus-label, .tc-sidebar-lists button {color: #999999; fill: #999999;} .omni-toc .tc-sidebar-lists button {color: #ff9999; fill: #ff9999;} .fleet-label {font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: 500;} .omnibus-label {font-weight: 500;} .tc-dragover .fleet-label, .tc-dragover .omnibus-label { border-radius: 5px;background-color: #0ff; } .can-omni-dragdrop {display: inline;} " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-tagging.tid": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-tagging.tid", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "text": "/* Tagging */ .can-omni-stream > .can-omni-tag-area {grid-column: 4/5; min-width: 2em; min-height: 1em; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-end; padding-left: 0.4em;} .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tags {height: 100%; max-width: 10em; padding: 0.2em 0.4em 0.2em 2em; display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: flex-end; align-content: flex-start; min-width: 5em;} .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area .tc-droppable {height: 100%; margin-left: -2em; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: flex-end; align-content: flex-end;} .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area .tc-dragover { background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, rgba(204,0,255,0.5) 100%); border-radius: 4px; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area .tc-droppable:hover { background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0,0,0,0) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.2) 100%); border-radius: 4px; } .can-omni-stream .tc-tag-label { margin: 0.1em; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area .ghost-tag { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-end; padding: 2px; fill: <>; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area:hover .ghost-tag, .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area .tc-dragover .ghost-tag { fill: #ffffff; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tag-area .ghost-tag svg { width: 12pt; height: 12pt; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-tags { font-size: 0.7em; } .can-omni-tagadd { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } .can-omni-tagadd .tc-add-tag-button button { display: none; } " }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-toc-mode.tid": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/styles-toc-mode.tid", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "text": " .can-omni-stream.toc { align-content: start; flex-shrink: 0; max-width:50%; background-color: #eeeeee; padding: 1em 0 1em 0.4em; margin-bottom: 1rem; margin-left: 0; border: 1px solid #dddddd; border-right-style: none; } .can-omni-stream .can-omni-stream.subtoc { padding-left: 2em; font-size: 0.8em; } div.omni-toc-heading { grid-column: 2/5; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.1; padding: 0.2em 1em 0.2em 0.2em; margin: 0.1em 0; cursor: pointer; } div.omni-toc-heading.selected { background-color: #ffffff; } div.omni-toc-heading:hover { background-color: #dddddd; } .omni-toc-view { width: 100%; flex: 1; border: 1px solid #dddddd; border-left-style: none; margin: 0 0 1rem 0; padding: 0.4rem 1rem 0.4rem 1rem; } .can-omni-toc-sub.can-omni-text { grid-column: 2/5; }" }, "$:/plugins/can/omni/template-macros": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omni/template-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "text": "\whitespace trim \define everyedit() <> <>
    <>
    <> <> <> <>
    <> <> <> <> \end \define everynamed() <> <>
    <>
    <> <> <> <> <>
    <> <> <> <> \end \define everynamedro() <>
    {{!!title}}
    <> <> \end \define everysimple() <>
    <>
    \end \define everytodo() <> <>
    <> <> <> <>
    <> <> \end \define everylist()
    <>
    <> <> \end \define everyread() <> <> <> \end \define everyoutline() <> \end \define everytoc() <$list filter="[tag[omnibus]]"><> <> \end \define everylist2(looks bad while teaser always displays ellipses)
    <$link><$macrocall $name=teaser title=<> chars=100 maxelements=1 />
    <> <> \end" } } }
